entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the boy who lived 17 years without knowing he was a wizard. He has a curiously shaped cut on his forehead.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wise and powerful wizard who has a scar above his left knee that resembles the London Underground map.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is known for being very emotional and having a shaggy head.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as someone who is important to Hagrid, but her relationship to him is not specified in the text.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is stern and warns Hagrid not to wake the Muggles.

relationships.description: Hagrid is emotionally affected by Lily's mention, indicating a close relationship between them.
Dumbledore takes Harry in his arms and turns towards the Dursleys' house, showing that he is caring for Harry.
Professor McGonagall warns Hagrid not to wake the Muggles, indicating a position of authority over him.
